In England, in the seven days to 10 August, there were 173,088 new confirmed cases (306.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 August, there were 160,764 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 8% (12,324 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 August is 5,475,833 (9,683.1 cases per 100,000 population).
